thread.title: Cash 5 Jackpot of $450,000 Split in Luzerne, Washington Counties
thread.title_full: Cash 5 Jackpot of $450,000 Split in Luzerne, Washington Counties

title: Cash 5 Jackpot of $450,000 Split in Luzerne, Washington Counties
text: Cash 5 Jackpot of $450,000 Split in Luzerne, Washington Counties 3/20/2017 Cash 5 Jackpot of $450,000 Split in Luzerne, Washington Counties Middletown, PA – A $450,000 Pennsylvania Lottery Cash 5 jackpot from the Friday, March 17, drawing was split by two winning tickets sold in Luzerne and Washington counties. Both tickets correctly matched all five balls drawn, 15-21-26-35-40, to each win $225,000, less applicable tax withholding. The big winning tickets were sold by Convenient Food Mart, 366 Wyoming Ave., Kingston, Luzerne County; and Rite Aid, 446 W. Main St., Monongahela, Washington County. Each retailer earns a $500 selling bonus. The prizes must be claimed and the tickets validated before the winners can be identified. Cash 5   Players holding a jackpot-winning Cash 5   any of Lottery’s seven area offices or at Lottery headquarters in Middletown, Dauphin County. Claims may be filed Monday through Friday from 8:30 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. at area offices and from 8 a.m. to 4 p.m. at headquarters. More than 37,600 other Cash 5 tickets won prizes of various amounts in the drawing, creating “Winners, winners – everywhere!” Players should   Luzerne County, the Pennsylvania Lottery awarded more than $88.6 million in prizes to winners and provided more than $36.6 million to programs that benefit older residents during the 2015-16 fiscal year. In Washington County, the Lottery awarded more than $39.5 million in prizes and contributed more than $20.6   play Cash 5: To play Cash 5, players pay $1 and select five numbers from 1 to 43. Players may select their own numbers using a Cash 5 playslip, or they may opt for computer-selected quick picks. Players must match all five numbers drawn to win the jackpot. Players also win prizes for matching two, three or four winning numbers. Cash 5 drawings are held seven nights a week, and tickets can be purchased up to seven draws (one week) in advance. Odds of winning the jackpot prize are 1-in-962,598; the overall odds of winning any prize are about 1-in-10.5.
